hero.title: Overcoming Depression
hero.text: Effective strategies to manage symptoms and improve quality of life...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Persistent sadness, loss of interest, sleep disturbances, fatigue, feelings of worthlessness, and suicidal thoughts.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), medication (SSRIs), lifestyle modifications.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Support groups, family counseling, crisis intervention.

hero.title: Managing Anxiety
hero.text: Practical tools to reduce anxiety and regain control...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Excessive worry, restlessness, rapid heartbeat, panic attacks, avoidance behavior.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Psychotherapy (CBT, exposure therapy), medications (SSRIs, benzodiazepines in severe cases).

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Relaxation techniques, mindfulness training, self-help resources.

hero.title: Balancing Life with Bipolar Disorder
hero.text: Strategies to manage mood swings and achieve stability...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Episodes of mania (high energy, impulsivity) and depression (low mood, fatigue, suicidal thoughts).

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Mood stabilizers (lithium, valproate), antipsychotics, psychotherapy.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Family education, adherence to treatment, lifestyle regulation.

hero.title: Living with Schizophrenia
hero.text: Comprehensive care for managing symptoms and improving quality of life...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Hallucinations, delusions, disorganized speech, social withdrawal.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Antipsychotic medications, psychosocial rehabilitation.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Vocational training, family therapy, assisted living services.

hero.title: Breaking Free from OCD
hero.text: Effective treatments to reduce obsessive thoughts and compulsive behaviors...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Intrusive obsessive thoughts, compulsive rituals, distress, time-consuming behaviors.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Exposure and Response Prevention (ERP), SSRIs.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Support groups, behavioral coaching, mindfulness techniques.

hero.title: Healing from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder
hero.text: Pathways to recovery and emotional well-being...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Flashbacks, nightmares, hypervigilance, emotional numbing.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Trauma-focused CBT, Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing (EMDR), SSRIs.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Peer support groups, relaxation therapy, coping skills training.

hero.title: Recovering from Eating Disorders
hero.text: Holistic approaches to restore health and self-esteem...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Distorted body image, excessive dieting, binge eating, purging.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Nutritional counseling, CBT, SSRIs for co-existing depression.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Family-based therapy, meal planning support, community programs.

hero.title: Thriving with ADHD
hero.text: Tailored strategies for focus and emotional regulation...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Inattention, hyperactivity, impulsivity, poor academic or work performance.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Stimulant medications (methylphenidate, amphetamines), behavioral therapy.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Classroom accommodations, parental training, executive function coaching.

hero.title: Caring for Dementia
hero.text: Support and strategies for patients and caregivers...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Memory loss, confusion, disorientation, personality changes, impaired judgment.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Cognitive enhancers (donepezil, memantine), behavioral interventions.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Caregiver education, memory aids, structured routines, respite care.

hero.title: Overcoming Addiction
hero.text: Pathways to recovery and long-term sobriety...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Craving, loss of control over substance use, withdrawal symptoms, neglect of responsibilities.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Detoxification, medication-assisted treatment (methadone, naltrexone), CBT.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: 12-step programs, group therapy, relapse prevention strategies.

hero.title: Managing Panic Attacks
hero.text: Tools to reduce panic and regain control...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Sudden intense fear, palpitations, dizziness, sweating, sense of impending doom.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: CBT, SSRIs, benzodiazepines for acute episodes.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Breathing exercises, stress management, lifestyle adjustments.

hero.title: Supporting Individuals with ASD
hero.text: Comprehensive care for communication and social skills...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Impaired social interaction, repetitive behaviors, communication difficulties.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Behavioral therapy (ABA), speech therapy, educational interventions.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Parental training, social skills groups, special education services.

hero.title: Managing Personality Disorders
hero.text: Strategies for emotional regulation and improved relationships...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Unstable relationships, impulsive behaviors, emotional dysregulation.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT), schema therapy, mood stabilizers.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Long-term psychotherapy, structured environments, group therapy.

hero.title: Addressing Conduct Disorder
hero.text: Interventions to improve behavior and social functioning...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Aggressive behavior, rule-breaking, deceitfulness, lack of empathy.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Behavioral therapy, parent management training, social skills training.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: School interventions, mentoring programs, family counseling.

hero.title: Strengthening Relationships
hero.text: Tools for better communication and conflict resolution...

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Communication breakdown, emotional detachment, frequent conflicts.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Couples therapy, conflict resolution training, behavioral techniques.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Marriage workshops, relationship coaching, supportive therapy groups.

info_columns.title: Symptoms
info_columns.content: Lack of sexual desire, erectile dysfunction, premature ejaculation, sexual aversion.

info_columns.title: Treatment
info_columns.content: Sex therapy, hormonal treatments, psychological interventions.

info_columns.title: Support
info_columns.content: Couples counseling, educational programs, stress management techniques.
